projects.title: The worlds first sun-activated coupon
projects.summary: The size of the discount in this mobile coupon is tied directly to the intensity of the sunlight it is exposed to.
projects.content:
The size of the discount in this mobile coupon is tied directly to the intensity of the sunlight it is exposed to.
The Challenge

The creative team on the Zealios account wanted a unique new way of providing product discounts on mobile devices.

#### The solution

I determined that a native application was out of the question because there was not a significant enough marketing budget to drive the number of downloads that would be required. Instead, a low barrier to entry was needed which can be achieved using typical web delivery.

In keeping with the phylosophy I promote the solution could not use any proprietary plugins and must be standards compliant. Fortunately Mozilla Firefox had implemented support for the [W3C ambient light sensor](https://www.w3.org/TR/2012/WD-ambient-light-20120802/) which meant it would be possible to detect light intensity measured in Lux.

The theory was tested by creating a single page that constantly polled the light sensor API and displayed the current lux value. My team then loaded this page on a variety of Android devices running Firefox and sampled light from numerous locations including indoors, outside in bright sun, outside on cloudy days and outside in the shade. The collated data not only confirmed the technical approach but it also gave us the threshold numbers to trigger the coupon.

__Note: The ambient light sensor was intended by the W3C to be used in responsive web sites to serve different contrast stylesheets depending upon how bright the surrounding light is. It detects light intensity not wavelength and does not provide a measurement of ultraviolet or UV index. While perfect for a marketing gimmick this lack of UV detection bothered me enough to explore and build a [personal UV gauge](https://d2ajvvqj1r3ayh.cloudfront.net/portfolio/personal-bluetooth-uv-gauge-and-ios-companion-app)__



#### MediaHits

The Worlds First Sun Activated Mobile Coupon was a big hit with mentions on[Mashable](http://mashable.com/2014/07/23/zealios-coupon-sunlight/#p5fbxdHicsqw) and numourous other sites and was shortlistedfor some awards.
